content: frolicking deer two sided hat materials yarn worsted weight 100% wool yarn approximately mc 350 yds cc 220 yds needle us 5 / 3 75 mm yarn darning needle size approximate dimensions 23 5 inches in circumference 11 inches from brim to top of hat gauge in stockinette 6 st & 7 5 row per inch common abbreviations & stitches used in this pattern k - knit mc main color p - purl cc contrast color model done using cascade yarns 220 superwash k2tog knit 2 together mc #813 deep blue cc #862 brown instructions & notes it does not matter which side you do first the hat will be totally reversible first side do a provisional cast on of 144 st in the mc yarn join to knit in the round then follow chart when eight stitches are left leave a six inch tail and cut yarn using your yarn darning needle run the yarn through the eight stitches pull tight and weave in end second side take out provisional cast on and put stitches on your needle do 1 round of purl stitches and then follow the other chart note be sure to weave in your ends before you start your second side decreases when eight stitches are left leave a six inch tail and cut yarn using the yarn darning needle run the yarn through the eight stitches pull tight and weave in end optional at the end of the second half secure the top of both halves of the hat together by making a few stitches through both layers and then weaving in the end page 1 of 3 copyright © 2011 mac s crafty creations all rights reserved this material in whole or in part may not be reprinted or distributed in any form or media without permission this pattern may not be used to produce items for sale or for other commercial purposes frolicking deer two sided hat page 2 of 3 copyright © 2011 mac s crafty creations all rights reserved this material in whole or in part may not be reprinted or distributed in any form or media without permission this pattern may not be used to produce items for sale or for other commercial purposes frolicking deer two sided hat page 3 of 3 copyright © 2011 mac s crafty creations all rights reserved this material in whole or in part may not be reprinted or distributed in any form or media without permission this pattern may not be used to produce items for sale or for other commercial purposes
